Item

phiv 2nd June 2019 at 11:01pm
decision

An item is an element of a Category. A Relationship is defined between for every pair of items from different categories. See RelationshipTable for the number of item pairs.

if two items from different category have equivalent strings, the Parser won't know what do do! * e.g. the Englishman left at 11:30 and arrived at 13:30
